org.neuroph.contrib.neat.gen.persistence.impl
Interface SerializationDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaSerializationDelegate, XStreamSerializationDelegate
public interface SerializationDelegate

A SerializationDelegate is used to perform the serialization as part of the DirectoryOutputPersistence implementation.

Author:
Aidan Morgan
